messages.message: Hi Team, I joined a customer call this week and they said they would want to have a converse like box under the field results in Human Review to ask any additional questions when reviewing and I think it actually makes a lot of sense. Is this something we have heard before / considered?
this has also been requested by Northwestern Mutual
I’ve been collecting notes on where LLMs can be added to Enterprise. So far this case and somewhere within refiner are my two biggest ideas.

Yup, this makes a lot of sense. Oftentimes, an adjuster or underwriter is faced with the fields or summary that we pulled, but then wants to further query the underlying documents. I really like how in uat AI Hub converse we can show how we got to the answer. It is kind of a combo of our provenance tracking and converse which is really useful when you’re going through long reports
IMO I think cutting down enterprise to a handful of apps, ditching the OS view, and sprinkling in LLMs would make a significant difference in the platform.

This is something we have heard before, and it is currently in the product roadmap backlog. LLMs should enable more intelligent editing in human review and make the concept of “informed re-extraction” a reality
